Title: Celebrate a festival with jubilation
Publisher: Tianjin renmin meishu chubanshe (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: An imaginary scene of a pleasant gathering of Mao, Zhou Enlai, Zhu De and Liu Shaoqi. Relations between the top leaders of the Party had not always been as relaxed and cordial as posters such as this one suggest. But the main message of the image is: Liu Shaoqi has been rehabilitated.
